item.title: Beyond RAG: How cache-augmented generation reduces latency, complexity for smaller workloads
item.description: As LLMs become more capable, many RAG applications can be replaced with cache-augmented generation that include documents in the prompt.

item.title: Runway’s new AI image generator Frames is here, and it looks fittingly cinematic
item.description: The model excels in rendering advanced textures, natural lighting and complex compositions, providing more flexibility.

item.title: Devin 1.2: Updated AI engineer enhances coding with smarter in-context reasoning, voice integration
item.description: Devin 1.2 will help developers with accelerated workflows and less cognitive load in file searches, understanding codebases or fixing code.

item.title: AI or Not raises $5M to stop AI fraud, deepfakes and misinformation
item.description: AI or Not, an AI fraud detection platform, has raised $5 million in a seed funding round to accelerate its use of "AI to detect AI" in images.

item.title: Dizzaract Games launches in Abu Dhabi as Middle East’s largest game studio
item.description: Dizzaract Games has officially launched as the largest game development studio in the Middle East.
